experience.description: Implemented research-driven inquiry-based learning models to enhance student engagement in the sciences. Utilized data-driven assessment strategies developed during undergraduate pedagogical research to track and improve student performance metrics.

Conducted a literature review and assisted in data collection for a study focused on the efficacy of active learning strategies in secondary STEM education. Presented findings on classroom management techniques at a regional education symposium.

metadata.experience_level: Relevant research done for the job field.
